alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 19 at 9:28AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin and Lost River Valley zones. Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 3.4 Fri 9 am MDT 3.7 4.1 4.4 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ068-074-202030- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0002.230521T0709Z-000000T0000Z/ /HWRI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 928 AM MDT Fri May 19 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM MDT Friday the stage was 3.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Lost River Valleys
